title: 371. Q&AF: Advertising In Other Avenues Outside Of Social Media, Getting Off Depression Medication & Having A Nothing To Lose Mentality
itunes:title: 371. Q&AF: Advertising In Other Avenues Outside Of Social Media, Getting Off Depression Medication & Having A Nothing To Lose Mentality
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on the best way to branch out in advertising your products/ services away from social media, what it's been like for him going off his depression medication, and how the top entrepreneurs adapt the nothing to lose mentality.
